listeo_listing_published_email_content:
Hi {user_name},

We are pleased to inform you that your submission '{listing_name}' was just published on our website.

Thank you.
listeo_listing_new_email_subject: Thank you for adding a listing
listeo_listing_new_email_content:
Hi {user_name},

Thank you for submitting your listing '{listing_name}'.
listeo_listing_expired_email_content:
Hi {user_name},

We'd like you to inform you that your listing '{listing_name}' has expired and is no longer visible on our website. You can renew it in your account.

Thank you
listeo_listing_expiring_soon_email_subje: Your listing is expiring in 5 days - {listing_name}
listeo_listing_expiring_soon_email_conte: Hi {user_name}, We'd like you to inform you that your listing '{listing_name}' is expiring in 5 days. Thank you
listeo_booking_user_waiting_approval_ema: Hi {user_name}, Thank you for your booking request on '{listing_name}' for {dates}. Please wait for confirmation and further instructions. Thank you
listeo_booking_owner_new_booking_email_s: There is a new booking request for {listing_name}
listeo_booking_owner_new_booking_email_c: Hi {user_name}, There's a new booking request on '{listing_name}' for {dates}. Go to your Bookings Dashboard to accept or reject it. Thank you
listeo_free_booking_confirmation_email_c:
Hi {user_name},

Your booking request on '{listing_name}' for {dates} was approved. See you soon!.

Thank you
listeo_pay_booking_confirmation_email_co: Hi {user_name}, Your booking request on '{listing_name}' for {dates} was approved. Here's the payment link {payment_url}, the booking will expire after {expiration} if not paid!. Thank you
listeo_paid_booking_confirmation_email_c:
Hi {user_name},

The booking for '{listing_name}' on {dates} has been paid by user.

Thank you
listeo_home_subtitle: You can configure homepage search form style in Customize  →  Home Search Options
listeo_listing_welcome_email_content:
Hi {user_name}, Welcome to our website.
  • Username: {login}
  • Password: {password}
Thank you.
